sentences.sContent: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.sCn: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.sContent: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.sCn: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

synos.tran: 疼痛的，痛心的；剧烈的，极度的；恼火的，发怒的；厉害的，迫切的

trans.tranOther: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection
